translation.Participe do primeiro evento online unin: Participate in the first online event uniting Portuguese and Brazilians to present and discuss Customer Experience and Customer Success.
translation.QUERO SER PATROCINADOR: I WANT TO BE A SPONSOR
translation.Apresentação de casos de sucesso de empr: Presentation of successful cases of companies that implemented CX and CS with great results.
translation.Debates sobre tendências internacionais: Debates on international trends to broaden your knowledge in CX and CS.
translation.Networking direcionado com referências e: Targeted networking with CX and CS references in their countries.
translation.Soluções para aumentar os resultados da: Solutions to increase the results of your company and your customers.
translation.Oportunidade de aprofundar o entendiment: Opportunity to deepen understanding of CX and CS and the complementarities between them.
translation.Não perca tempo e aproveite esse primeir: Don't waste time and enjoy this first batch with free registration at The Customer Summit.
